about_the_game:
Game Background：


As an interstellar guardian, the player will travel between various planets to protect the interstellar heritage while fending off waves of enemy attacks in the game's universe, which is full of interstellar artifacts and mysterious energy.

Gameplay & Features：


This is a VR shooting game with Roguelike elements, featuring multiple planets for you to challenge. Each planet offers a unique environment to explore. Choose from a variety of characters, each bringing a new gaming experience. With a wide selection of weapons available, each offering different control mechanics and immersive audio-visual feedback, you can customize your gameplay. Unlock numerous skills and props to enhance your abilities and defeat waves of enemy attacks. Face powerful chiefs as you showcase your gaming prowess. With each enemy wave lasting a few minutes, strategize ways to destroy them and make use of the store to acquire items in-between waves.

Although the current version includes only one planet, three weapons, one character, dozens of skills and props, one leader, and some monsters, the focus is on enhancing the overall gaming experience and optimizing audio-visual feedback.
Future updates will continue to expand the game's content.

Values：


Be wild always places the players first.
We decided to release the demo version of our game in its early development stage with the intention of continuously improving and enhancing it based on player feedback regarding their overall gameplay experience. Our goal is to provide players with an immersive experience that truly maximizes their enjoyment of weapons, skills, and combat. We will intensify our efforts during the Early Access phase to further refine the game.

What comes next：


We will focus on enhancing the game content by introducing a wider variety of characters, weapons, skills, and props. Additionally, we aim to incorporate more diverse battle scenes and dynamic scene transitions. To further enhance the gameplay experience, we will introduce a range of captivating monsters.

Simultaneously, we will be dedicated to refining the art effects, as well as improving the AI of monsters and bosses to create even more engaging battles. Taking into account player feedback, we will continuously optimize weapons, skills, and overall immersion to deliver a unique gaming experience.

About our Studio：


We are a Singapore-based independent game studio, known as "Be Wild".
detailed_description:
Regarding the Suspension of Updates on Steam

Regarding the Suspension of Updates on Steam
Due to the limited manpower within our team, we have devoted a significant amount of time to the optimization and updates for the Quest standalone VR system. As a result, we are unable to continue to guarantee the frequency of updates or the gaming experience on the Steam version. Consequently, we have made the difficult decision to temporarily suspend updates for the Steam version of our game.

For those who wish to experience the latest version of our game, we encourage you to visit the Quest platform to download the updated content.



We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude to all our players for your affection and support throughout this journey.and we welcome you to join our community to discuss everything about the game with us.


Thank you for your understanding and continued passion for our game.

name: Star Legacy VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR: Tested on Quest 2, Index, PICO3, PICO4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 / AMD Ryzen 3600 or greater
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR: Tested on Quest 2, Index, PICO3, PICO4

short_description: Star Legacy VR is an immersive virtual reality shooting game that incorporates intriguing Roguelike elements into gameplay. Players assume the roles of interstellar guardians who venture across diverse planets and traverse through various time zones.
